transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes sir, this is [inaudible] from IndiaMART.
Customer: Hello, yes sir, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan, aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan sir, main yeh bol raha tha ki haan sir, kaisa chal raha hai sir service?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Sir, main yeh bol raha tha, haan sir, kare na ki aapka monthly ek installment baaki hai sir.
Customer: Main naane ki tayari mein hun.
Customer: Nahi sir, koi baat nahi.
Executive: Nahi, koi baat nahi sir, main bol raha hun na ki sir ₹1,10,949 ka baaki hai sir, toh usko aaj payment kar sakte, payment kara dijiye sir.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Haan, karenge woh bhi karenge.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Kab tak? Yes sir, main bol raha hun na sir aapka ek
Customer: Payment baaki hai sir ₹1,10,000.
Customer: Kitna hai sir?
Customer: Din mein, din mein karte hain baat. Thoda koi guest baithe hue hain andar, meri naane dhone ki tayari hai, hai na?
Executive: Toh, okay sir, main 11:00 baje call karun sir?
Customer: Kariban karo 3:00-4:00 baje ke aas paas karo.
Executive: Sir, 3:00 baje karenge toh phir aaj, aaj sir 3:00 baje karenge toh phir payment aaj nahi ho payega sir, aaj bank mein daalna padega na sir bank mein.
Customer: Arre sir ji, 30 din, abhi toh aaj, aaj toh 17 tareekh hui hai, 30 din hue hain.
Executive: Nahi sir, sir, sir, sir 30 din nahi hue hain sir, dekhiye aapne 14 tareekh ko kiya tha, aaj ho gaya ek, 35 din ho gaya sir.
Customer: Aaj, aaj 18 hai sir.
Executive: Sir, maine payment kiya tha 16 tareekh ko.
Executive: Haan, sir toh yeh last, jo last yeh payment tha na, uska aapne 40 din ka liya tha. Jo second wala tha usme aapne bola tha ki main kar dunga, baaki jo last payment hai uska aapne mam se approval leke 40 din ka karwaya tha sir.
Customer: Karte hain woh bhi baat karte hain, abhi mere koi guest baithe hue hain. Aur main bhi naane dhone ke liye ja raha hun.
Executive: I know sir, main yeh bol raha hun ki sir ki kab tak aap payment kar dijiye, kar dijiyega?
Customer: Woh sab kar rahe hain, woh sab hai. Abhi kya thoda.
Executive: Karte hain vyavastha.
Executive: Karte hain vyavastha.
Executive: Time se, kyunki, kyunki sir aapka jo hai na shukrawar ko hi aa gaya tha pop-up, maine aapko bataya tha na, meri baat hui thi, B.S. se shukrawar ko, yeh budhwar ko baat hui thi, toh maine aapko inform.
Executive: Toh kab tak main bolun?
Customer: Aagey tha aapka phone aaya tha.
Executive: Sir abhi [unintelligible] baithe hue hain do-teen din.
Executive: I know, I know sir, main bas aap puchhiye main kyunki yahan pe mujhe mention karna hoga sir, toh kab payment kab tak aapka aa jayega sir?
Customer: Sir abhi nahi bata sakta hun main, aap 3:00-4:00 baje call karo, free hoke phir baat karte hain.
Executive: 3:00-4:00 baje.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive: Customer has a pending payment.



Resolution:

- Customer said he will make the payment later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back at 3:00-4:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, installment, pending payment
